settings.name: Language
settings.description: Selects the language to be used in menu items and messages

settings.name: Area/Date/Time Setting
settings.description: Access to region, date and time settings

settings.name: Area Setting
settings.description: Sets the region where the camera is being used

settings.name: Daylight Savings
settings.description: Sets whether to use daylight saving time

settings.name: Date/Time
settings.description: Sets the date and time

settings.name: Date Format
settings.description: Sets the date display format

settings.name: Monitor Brightness
settings.description: Adjusts the screen brightness

settings.name: Viewfinder Bright.
settings.description: Sets the brightness of the viewfinder

settings.name: Display Quality
settings.description: Sets the display quality

settings.name: Operation Sound
settings.description: Sets whether to produce a beep sound during operation

settings.name: Power Save Start Time
settings.description: Sets the time before the camera automatically powers off

settings.name: Auto Power OFF Temp.
settings.description: Sets the temperature at which the camera turns off automatically during shooting

settings.name: Volume Settings
settings.description: Access to volume settings for various camera functions

settings.name: Record Media Settings
settings.description: Settings for memory cards and recording media

settings.name: Recording Media
settings.description: Selects which memory card slot to use for recording

settings.name: Recording Mode
settings.description: Sets how images are recorded to the two memory card slots

settings.name: Auto Switch Media
settings.description: Sets whether to switch to the other memory card when a memory card becomes full

settings.name: File/Folder Settings
settings.description: Access to file and folder settings

settings.name: Format
settings.description: Formats (initializes) the memory card

settings.name: Operation Customize
settings.description: Access to customization settings for operation

settings.name: Custom Key Setting
settings.description: Customizes button functions

settings.name: Custom Key/Dial Set.
settings.description: Assigns functions to buttons and dials

settings.name: Fn Menu Settings
settings.description: Customizes the functions displayed in the Function menu

settings.name: Touch Operation
settings.description: Sets whether to activate touch operations on the monitor

settings.name: Touch Panel/Pad
settings.description: Sets the touch operation mode

settings.name: Touch Sensitivity
settings.description: Sets the sensitivity of the touch panel

settings.name: Touch Pad Settings
settings.description: Access to touch pad settings

settings.name: HDMI Resolution
settings.description: Sets the resolution when connecting to an HDMI TV

settings.name: HDMI Output Settings
settings.description: Access to HDMI output settings

settings.name: USB Connection
settings.description: Sets the USB connection method

settings.name: USB LUN Setting
settings.description: Sets whether to limit USB connection functions

settings.name: USB Power Supply
settings.description: Sets whether to supply power via USB cable

settings.name: Network
settings.description: Access to network settings

settings.name: Version
settings.description: Displays the camera software version

settings.name: Format
settings.description: Formats (initializes) the selected memory card

settings.name: Select Memory Card
settings.description: Selects which memory card to format

settings.name: Format Type
settings.description: Sets the type of formatting to perform
